text: As lymph node enlargement is the most common sign , apart from skin and mucocutaneous lesions , FeL should be included in the differential list when this finding is noted on physical examination as solitary or generalized lymphadenomegaly . This list mainly includes infections with other infectious agents ( FIV , FeLV , FCoV , Bartonella , Mycobacteria , T . gondii , Cryptococcus or other systemic mycoses ) , lymphoma or metastatic involvement from other neoplasia .
